sect2.title: Zend_Application_Resource_Router
sect2.para: Zend_Application_Resource_Router can be used to configure the router as it is registered with the Front Controller. Configuration options are per the Zend_Controller_Router_Route options.

example.title: Sample Router Resource configuration
example.para: Below is a sample INI snippet showing how to configure the router resource.
example.programlisting:
resources.router.routes.route_id.route = "/login" resources.router.routes.route_id.defaults.module = "user" resources.router.routes.route_id.defaults.controller = "login" resources.router.routes.route_id.defaults.action = "index"
; Optionally you can also set a Chain Name Separator: resources.router.chainNameSeparator = "_"
example.para: For more information on the Chain Name Separator, please see its section.
